frontmatter.title: Manipulating images using OpenCV region of interest
A fix for g++ not being able to find OpenCV dependencies on Ubuntu 18.04

about.my-description: I'm a student of computer engineering at Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte. I'm interested primarily in topics about Android Development, but I also have a hobbyist interest in Machine Learning and Operating Systems.

bloglist.blog-description: Small posts about computer science stuff that I found useful.

home.my-place: This is where I sit down and share my thoughts about coding topics.
home.my-goal: Hopefully I'll be able to share useful information to the world, the same way it did for me.
